name: Tumblr Hivemind Killer
description: Sometimes you just want to see if someone has posted opinions on a post on Tumblr. Good luck sifting through 10000+ notes of silent likes and reblogs to find the one piece of interesting commentary, though! Introducing Tumblr Hivemind Killer - a script that, when browsing the notes to a post, only displays people who have reblogged with commentary. This works both on your dashboard and on blogs. See this post for more.
